statements: SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT payment_id, cardholder_name FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM PaymentInformation WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation WHERE cardholder_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT payment_id, cvv FROM PaymentInformation ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation WHERE payment_id = 123;
SELECT card_number, cardholder_name FROM PaymentInformation WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM PaymentInformation WHERE cardholder_name = 'Alice' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, encrypted_data FROM PaymentInformation WHERE cvv IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, payment_data FROM payments;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, payment_data FROM payments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM payments ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, payment_data FROM payments WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN encryption_keys ON payments.id = encryption_keys.key_id WHERE payments.id < 50;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE id BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, payment_data FROM payments WHERE id = 10 OR id = 20 OR id = 30 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = 54321;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM encryption_logs WHERE action = 'encrypt' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM encryption_logs WHERE user_id = 98765;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM payment_information WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, action FROM encryption_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date, cvv FROM payment_information WHERE user_id = 54321 AND expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, encryption_key, decryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT payment_id, credit_card_number FROM PaymentInformation;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionFunctions WHERE encryption_type = 'AES';
SELECT function_id, encryption_type, decryption_key FROM EncryptionFunctions;
SELECT log_timestamp, action_performed FROM AuditLog ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT credit_card_number, encrypted_card_holder_name FROM PaymentInformation WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT function_id, encryption_type FROM EncryptionFunctions ORDER BY function_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditLog WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT UserRoles.user_id, UserRoles.role_name, AuditLog.action_performed FROM UserRoles INNER JOIN AuditLog ON UserRoles.user_id = AuditLog.user_id;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionKeys;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM EncryptionKeys ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EncryptedData WHERE encryption_key_id = 2;
SELECT decrypted_content FROM DecryptedData WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, payment_method FROM PaymentInformation WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM EncryptionKeys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_content, encryption_key_id FROM EncryptedData WHERE encryption_key_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM DecryptionKeys WHERE decryption_key = 'SecretKey';
SELECT decrypted_content FROM DecryptedData WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, payment_data FROM PaymentInformation WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
